lead_paragraph: Pittsburgh Penguins star Sidney Crosby felt Cam Fowler's stick desperately tugging at his jersey and kept right on skating. Breaking in all alone against Anaheim goaltender John Gibson, Crosby kept Fowler at bay long enough to rip a wrist shot over Gibson's glove and into the net, the most elaborate display of a hot streak that shows no signs of slowing.

headline.print_headline: Crosby Scores in 7th Straight, Penguins Top Ducks 6-2
headline.main: Crosby Scores in 7th Straight, Penguins Top Ducks 6-2
